message: Let's split the money evenly. This way, we both get a fair share.
I'll take the majority, you can have a smaller share, but it's still better than nothing!
I believe in fairness. Let's share the wealth equally, just like in our previous proposal.
You rejected my offer, now I'll take a bigger share, you can have a tiny bit.
I think a 40-60 split would be fair. It respects the value of our initial proposal while adjusting for inflation.
